Cron Info

1 # Minute   Hour   Day of Month       Month          Day of Week        Command   
2 # (0-59)  (0-23)     (1-31)    (1-12 or Jan-Dec)  (0-6 or Sun-Sat)
3     0        2          12             *               0,6           /usr/bin/find
